title: 2 Ways to Sort and Filter Your Search Results on YouTube

steps.title: Open the YouTube app.
steps.content: Open the YouTube app. This looks like a white play button in a red box. This method will filter YouTube videos based on upload date, duration, and more. If you're a parent looking to filter YouTube videos for your child, see our article to put parental controls on YouTube instead.

steps.title: Enter a search.
steps.content: Enter a search. Tap the magnifying glass in the top-right corner and enter keywords to search YouTube. Then, tap Search . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . This is in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Search filters.
steps.content: Tap Search filters . A new menu will open.

steps.title: Select your search filters.
steps.content: Select your search filters. You can select filters for Sort by , Type , Upload date , Duration , and Features . There will be a checkmark next to the option you select. Sort by : Relevance, Upload date, View count, or Rating Type : All, Video, Channel, Playlist, or Movie Upload date : Anytime, Last hour, Today, This week, This month, This year Duration : Any, Under 4 minutes, 4 - 20 minutes, or Over 20 minutes Features : Live, 4K, HD, Subtitles/CC, Creative Commons, 360°, VR180, 3D, HDR, Location, or Purchased

steps.title: Tap the back arrow.
steps.content: Tap the back arrow. This is in the top-left corner. You'll return to the search results with the new search filters applied. If you want to create playlists , you'll need to be logged into your account .

steps.title: Go to https://www.youtube.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.youtube.com/ in a web browser. You can use any browser. You can add filters to your search results to find specific YouTube videos .

steps.title: Enter a search.
steps.content: Enter a search. Click the field at the top and enter keywords to search YouTube.

steps.title: Click Filters.
steps.content: Click Filters . This is at the top-right corner of the search results. A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Select a search filter.
steps.content: Select a search filter. You can select filters for Upload date , Type , Duration , Features , and Sort by . When you click a search filter, it will be applied immediately. Upload date : Anytime, Last hour, Today, This week, This month, This year Type : All, Video, Channel, Playlist, or Movie Duration : Any, Under 4 minutes, 4 - 20 minutes, or Over 20 minutes Features : Live, 4K, HD, Subtitles/CC, Creative Commons, 360°, VR180, 3D, HDR, Location, or Purchased Sort by : Relevance, Upload date , View count, or Rating

steps.title: Apply more search filters (optional).
steps.content: Apply more search filters (optional). When you select a search filter, the window will close and your search results will reload with the filter applied. To add more, click Filter again and select a new filter. Repeat if you want to add more.
